p: Reviewer #1: The manuscript entitles “Complexity of Active Medicinical Ingredients in Radix Scutelariae with Sodium Hydrosulfite Exposure” was thoroughly reviewed to evaluate its possible acceptance in PLOS One. Overall, the results and discussion of this study are still weak. The manuscript is poorly prepared and required significant improvement. Therefore, unfortunately, this manuscript may not be suitable for publication in PLOS One.
